ended in victory for the humans... no, for Lord Rance when he was still human.\""},{"lineNumber":264523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　しかし、今やランス様は我ら魔物の長」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, now Lord Rance is the leader of us monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":264524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間共との終戦協定など意味無き事、いますぐ人間共に攻め込めとお命じ下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A peace treaty with humans is meaningless; please command us to attack the humans immediately.\""},{"lineNumber":264525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　我ら、必ずや人間共を殲滅し魔王様の前に世界の全てを持ち帰ります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We will surely annihilate the humans and bring the entire world before the Demon Lord.\""},{"lineNumber":264526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　魔物達は、魔王の誕生に興奮している、今度こそ人類を倒すと","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters are excited about the birth of the Demon Lord, determined to defeat humanity this time for sure."},{"lineNumber":264527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　状況を説明する為に魔物達のヒソヒソ話も入れるのもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be good to include the monsters whispering to explain the situation."},{"lineNumber":264528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　新魔王様、すごい、かっこいい","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The new Demon Lord is amazing, so cool.\""},{"lineNumber":264529,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　ケイブリスなんかに付いているのは不快だったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was unpleasant to be with someone like Caybris.\""},{"lineNumber":264530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　ランス様は、人間の時から鬼畜で邪悪だったらしいぞ、はむかう物は殺す、女は犯す","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance was apparently brutal and evil even when human: he kills those who resist and violates women.\""},{"lineNumber":264531,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　すばらしい、まさに我ら魔物のボスにふさわしい","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wonderful, truly befitting the boss of us monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":264532,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　人間だった頃から、サテラ様を始めとする数名の魔人を従え、何体もの魔人も倒したとか","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even as a human, he commanded several demonic beings including Lady Satela and defeated many demons.\""},{"lineNumber":264533,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　歴代最強だな、まさに魔王になるべくして現れた存在","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The strongest ever, a being who appeared to become the Demon Lord.\""},{"lineNumber":264534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　この方と共に我らは魔物の黄金時代を歩むのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Together with him, we will walk through the golden age of monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":264535,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　おい、静かにしろ魔王様が何か語られるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, be quiet. The Demon Lord is about to say something.\""},{"lineNumber":264536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　「これが魔王か、ふむ、悪く感じだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this is the Demon Lord. Hmm, doesn't feel bad.\""},{"lineNumber":264537,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　世界の頂点に立つ俺様にふさわしい力だ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A power befitting me, who stands at the top of the world.\""},{"lineNumber":264538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　よし、新魔王として魔物共に命じる。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, as the new Demon Lord, I command the monsters.\""},{"lineNumber":264539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　ざわざわ、ドキドキ　魔物達の期待の雰囲気","translatedEnglishLine":"Murmurs and heartbeats—a mood of anticipation among the monsters."},{"lineNumber":264540,"originalJapaneseLine":"　「人間魔物とわず、美女は全て俺の物だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Regardless of human or monster, all beautiful women belong to me.\""},{"lineNumber":264541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　よって、てめぇらの略奪や戦争行為は一切は禁じる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Therefore, your plundering and acts of war are completely forbidden.\""},{"lineNumber":264542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　魔物界の奥地にでもひっこんでいろ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Go hide deep within the monster realm.\""},{"lineNumber":264543,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　勝手な事をしてやつは、反逆者として俺が処刑する」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyone who acts without permission, I will execute as a traitor.\""},{"lineNumber":264544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物達、がっかり","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters are disappointed."},{"lineNumber":264545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス　がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance: Hahaha!"},{"lineNumber":264546,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army attempting to invade JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":264547,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋に大軍を展開している","translatedEnglishLine":"They are deploying a large army at Tenmabashi."},{"lineNumber":264548,"originalJapaneseLine":"妖怪軍団と五十六が迎撃準備","translatedEnglishLine":"The yokai corps and Isoroku are preparing to intercept."},{"lineNumber":264549,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している","translatedEnglishLine":"However, due to Kurobe's revival, their forces have been halved."},{"lineNumber":264550,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　大陸の端にあるＪＡＰＡＮ","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, located at the continent's edge."},{"lineNumber":264551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　この地も魔軍に攻め落とされた","translatedEnglishLine":"This land has also been conquered by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":264552,"originalJapaneseLine":"条件：ランスの部下として揃った時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When gathered as Rance's subordinates."},{"lineNumber":264553,"originalJapaneseLine":"　政宗、お町、ノワール、折女、野菊","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune, Ochou, Noir, Orihime, Nogiku."},{"lineNumber":264554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264555,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、再集結したメンバーの会話。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, conversation among the regrouped members."},{"lineNumber":264556,"originalJapaneseLine":"城のメンバーとの会話でもいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe a conversation with the castle members is fine too."},{"lineNumber":264557,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗、最初は見た目でびっくりしたけど・・もてるのわかるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune, at first I was surprised by your appearance, but I understand why you're popular."},{"lineNumber":264558,"originalJapaneseLine":"かっこいいもんねとメイドさん達とか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Because you're cool, the maids and others think so..."},{"lineNumber":264559,"originalJapaneseLine":"クエスト発生条件","translatedEnglishLine":"Quest trigger conditions."},{"lineNumber":264560,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市が滅亡、ＪＡＰＡＮに魔軍が攻めようとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"The free city has fallen, and the demon army is trying to invade JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":264561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス城は健在","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle remains intact."},{"lineNumber":264562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　[天満橋の大軍／通常]発生後","translatedEnglishLine":"After the event [Tenmabashi's large army / normal]."},{"lineNumber":264563,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264564,"originalJapaneseLine":"織田城","translatedEnglishLine":"Oda Castle."},{"lineNumber":264565,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがやってきた。天満橋を封鎖している魔軍をうまく避けてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance has arrived. He skillfully avoided the demon army blocking Tenmabashi."},{"lineNumber":264566,"originalJapaneseLine":"大変だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was tough."},{"lineNumber":264567,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫もついてきています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kouhime has come along as well."},{"lineNumber":264568,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六、政宗、政宗の女達との出会い","translatedEnglishLine":"Meeting with Isoroku, Masamune, and Masamune’s women."},{"lineNumber":264569,"originalJapaneseLine":"妖怪達の方で何か事件が起こったと聞いたがなんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard something happened with the yokai—what is it?"},{"lineNumber":264570,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗あたりが説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune or someone explains."},{"lineNumber":264571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪王黒部が復活した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The yokai king Kurobe has been revived."},{"lineNumber":264572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　妖怪王はお前だろうが、＞　私は３代目、お町は２代目　現れたのは初代だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You are the yokai king, right? > I am the third generation, Ochou is the second, but the one who appeared is the first."},{"lineNumber":264573,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今から２３００年ほど前、","translatedEnglishLine":"About 2300 years ago,"},{"lineNumber":264574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　初代妖怪王黒部は藤原石丸と言うＪＡＰＡＮの武者に仕え一時は世界の大半を支配した","translatedEnglishLine":"The first yokai king Kurobe served a JAPAN warrior named Fujiwara Ishimaru and once controlled most of the world."},{"lineNumber":264575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結果としてはその後、魔人ザビエルを中心とする魔軍の攻撃にあい黒部も藤原石丸も死ぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, later they were attacked by the demon army led by the demon Javier, and both Kurobe and Fujiwara Ishimaru died."},{"lineNumber":264576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類が魔人と本格的に戦った最初の戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"The first serious battle where humanity fought demons."},{"lineNumber":264577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして今","translatedEnglishLine":"And now,"},{"lineNumber":264578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ザビエルが滅んだせいか、または、魔軍と人類の大きな戦いが起こったせいかわからぬが","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether because demon Javier was destroyed or because a major battle between the demon army and humans occurred, it is unclear,"},{"lineNumber":264579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒部が蘇った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe has revived."},{"lineNumber":264580,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒部はとても強い。初代妖怪王として尊敬すべき存在。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe is very strong — a being worthy of respect as the first yokai king."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「反逆者ケイブリスが起こした戦争は、人間共・・いえ、人間だった頃のランス様の勝利で終わりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The war initiated by the rebel Caybris ended in victory for the humans... no, for Lord Rance when he was still human."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今やランス様は我ら魔物の長」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, now Lord Rance is the leader of us monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共との終戦協定など意味無き事、いますぐ人間共に攻め込めとお命じ下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A peace treaty with humans is meaningless; please command us to attack the humans immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら、必ずや人間共を殲滅し魔王様の前に世界の全てを持ち帰ります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will surely annihilate the humans and bring the entire world before the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は、魔王の誕生に興奮している、今度こそ人類を倒すと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are excited about the birth of the Demon Lord, determined to defeat humanity this time for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を説明する為に魔物達のヒソヒソ話も入れるのもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good to include the monsters whispering to explain the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王様、すごい、かっこいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The new Demon Lord is amazing, so cool."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスなんかに付いているのは不快だったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was unpleasant to be with someone like Caybris."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様は、人間の時から鬼畜で邪悪だったらしいぞ、はむかう物は殺す、女は犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance was apparently brutal and evil even when human: he kills those who resist and violates women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すばらしい、まさに我ら魔物のボスにふさわしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wonderful, truly befitting the boss of us monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間だった頃から、サテラ様を始めとする数名の魔人を従え、何体もの魔人も倒したとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even as a human, he commanded several demonic beings including Lady Satela and defeated many demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代最強だな、まさに魔王になるべくして現れた存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The strongest ever, a being who appeared to become the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方と共に我らは魔物の黄金時代を歩むのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Together with him, we will walk through the golden age of monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、静かにしろ魔王様が何か語られるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, be quiet. The Demon Lord is about to say something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが魔王か、ふむ、悪く感じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is the Demon Lord. Hmm, doesn't feel bad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の頂点に立つ俺様にふさわしい力だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A power befitting me, who stands at the top of the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、新魔王として魔物共に命じる。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, as the new Demon Lord, I command the monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざわざわ、ドキドキ　魔物達の期待の雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Murmurs and heartbeats—a mood of anticipation among the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間魔物とわず、美女は全て俺の物だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regardless of human or monster, all beautiful women belong to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よって、てめぇらの略奪や戦争行為は一切は禁じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, your plundering and acts of war are completely forbidden."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の奥地にでもひっこんでいろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Go hide deep within the monster realm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手な事をしてやつは、反逆者として俺が処刑する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who acts without permission, I will execute as a traitor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達、がっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: Hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army attempting to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋に大軍を展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are deploying a large army at Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪軍団と五十六が迎撃準備
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The yokai corps and Isoroku are preparing to intercept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, due to Kurobe's revival, their forces have been halved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸の端にあるＪＡＰＡＮ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, located at the continent's edge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地も魔軍に攻め落とされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This land has also been conquered by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：ランスの部下として揃った時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When gathered as Rance's subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、お町、ノワール、折女、野菊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune, Ochou, Noir, Orihime, Nogiku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、再集結したメンバーの会話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, conversation among the regrouped members.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城のメンバーとの会話でもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe a conversation with the castle members is fine too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、最初は見た目でびっくりしたけど・・もてるのわかるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune, at first I was surprised by your appearance, but I understand why you're popular.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かっこいいもんねとメイドさん達とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you're cool, the maids and others think so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト発生条件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quest trigger conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市が滅亡、ＪＡＰＡＮに魔軍が攻めようとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The free city has fallen, and the demon army is trying to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は健在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [天満橋の大軍／通常]発生後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the event [Tenmabashi's large army / normal].

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがやってきた。天満橋を封鎖している魔軍をうまく避けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has arrived. He skillfully avoided the demon army blocking Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫もついてきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kouhime has come along as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六、政宗、政宗の女達との出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting with Isoroku, Masamune, and Masamune’s women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪達の方で何か事件が起こったと聞いたがなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard something happened with the yokai—what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗あたりが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune or someone explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王黒部が復活した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The yokai king Kurobe has been revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王はお前だろうが、＞　私は３代目、お町は２代目　現れたのは初代だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are the yokai king, right? > I am the third generation, Ochou is the second, but the one who appeared is the first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から２３００年ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 2300 years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王黒部は藤原石丸と言うＪＡＰＡＮの武者に仕え一時は世界の大半を支配した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first yokai king Kurobe served a JAPAN warrior named Fujiwara Ishimaru and once controlled most of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果としてはその後、魔人ザビエルを中心とする魔軍の攻撃にあい黒部も藤原石丸も死ぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, later they were attacked by the demon army led by the demon Javier, and both Kurobe and Fujiwara Ishimaru died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が魔人と本格的に戦った最初の戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first serious battle where humanity fought demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして今
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルが滅んだせいか、または、魔軍と人類の大きな戦いが起こったせいかわからぬが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether because demon Javier was destroyed or because a major battle between the demon army and humans occurred, it is unclear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が蘇った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe has revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部はとても強い。初代妖怪王として尊敬すべき存在。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe is very strong — a being worthy of respect as the first yokai king.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

> I am the third generation, Ochou is the second, but the one who appeared is the first."},{"lineNumber":264573,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今から２３００年ほど前、","translatedEnglishLine":"About 2300 years ago,"},{"lineNumber":264574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　初代妖怪王黒部は藤原石丸と言うＪＡＰＡＮの武者に仕え一時は世界の大半を支配した","translatedEnglishLine":"The first yokai king Kurobe served a JAPAN warrior named Fujiwara Ishimaru and once controlled most of the world."},{"lineNumber":264575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結果としてはその後、魔人ザビエルを中心とする魔軍の攻撃にあい黒部も藤原石丸も死ぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, later they were attacked by the demon army led by the demon Javier, and both Kurobe and Fujiwara Ishimaru died."},{"lineNumber":264576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類が魔人と本格的に戦った最初の戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"The first serious battle where humanity fought demons."},{"lineNumber":264577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして今","translatedEnglishLine":"And now,"},{"lineNumber":264578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ザビエルが滅んだせいか、または、魔軍と人類の大きな戦いが起こったせいかわからぬが","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether because demon Javier was destroyed or because a major battle between the demon army and humans occurred, it is unclear,"},{"lineNumber":264579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒部が蘇った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe has revived."},{"lineNumber":264580,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":264581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒部はとても強い。初代妖怪王として尊敬すべき存在。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurobe is very strong — a being worthy of respect as the first yokai king."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「反逆者ケイブリスが起こした戦争は、人間共・・いえ、人間だった頃のランス様の勝利で終わりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The war initiated by the rebel Caybris ended in victory for the humans... no, for Lord Rance when he was still human."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今やランス様は我ら魔物の長」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, now Lord Rance is the leader of us monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共との終戦協定など意味無き事、いますぐ人間共に攻め込めとお命じ下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A peace treaty with humans is meaningless; please command us to attack the humans immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら、必ずや人間共を殲滅し魔王様の前に世界の全てを持ち帰ります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will surely annihilate the humans and bring the entire world before the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は、魔王の誕生に興奮している、今度こそ人類を倒すと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are excited about the birth of the Demon Lord, determined to defeat humanity this time for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を説明する為に魔物達のヒソヒソ話も入れるのもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good to include the monsters whispering to explain the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王様、すごい、かっこいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The new Demon Lord is amazing, so cool."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスなんかに付いているのは不快だったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was unpleasant to be with someone like Caybris."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様は、人間の時から鬼畜で邪悪だったらしいぞ、はむかう物は殺す、女は犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance was apparently brutal and evil even when human: he kills those who resist and violates women."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すばらしい、まさに我ら魔物のボスにふさわしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wonderful, truly befitting the boss of us monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間だった頃から、サテラ様を始めとする数名の魔人を従え、何体もの魔人も倒したとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even as a human, he commanded several demonic beings including Lady Satela and defeated many demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代最強だな、まさに魔王になるべくして現れた存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The strongest ever, a being who appeared to become the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方と共に我らは魔物の黄金時代を歩むのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Together with him, we will walk through the golden age of monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、静かにしろ魔王様が何か語られるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, be quiet. The Demon Lord is about to say something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが魔王か、ふむ、悪く感じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is the Demon Lord. Hmm, doesn't feel bad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の頂点に立つ俺様にふさわしい力だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A power befitting me, who stands at the top of the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、新魔王として魔物共に命じる。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, as the new Demon Lord, I command the monsters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざわざわ、ドキドキ　魔物達の期待の雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Murmurs and heartbeats—a mood of anticipation among the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間魔物とわず、美女は全て俺の物だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Regardless of human or monster, all beautiful women belong to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よって、てめぇらの略奪や戦争行為は一切は禁じる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, your plundering and acts of war are completely forbidden."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の奥地にでもひっこんでいろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Go hide deep within the monster realm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手な事をしてやつは、反逆者として俺が処刑する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who acts without permission, I will execute as a traitor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達、がっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters are disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス　がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: Hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮに攻め込もうとしている魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army attempting to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋に大軍を展開している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are deploying a large army at Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪軍団と五十六が迎撃準備
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The yokai corps and Isoroku are preparing to intercept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、黒部の復活で戦力は半減している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, due to Kurobe's revival, their forces have been halved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸の端にあるＪＡＰＡＮ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, located at the continent's edge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地も魔軍に攻め落とされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This land has also been conquered by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：ランスの部下として揃った時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When gathered as Rance's subordinates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、お町、ノワール、折女、野菊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune, Ochou, Noir, Orihime, Nogiku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、再集結したメンバーの会話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle, conversation among the regrouped members.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城のメンバーとの会話でもいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe a conversation with the castle members is fine too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗、最初は見た目でびっくりしたけど・・もてるのわかるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune, at first I was surprised by your appearance, but I understand why you're popular.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かっこいいもんねとメイドさん達とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you're cool, the maids and others think so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト発生条件
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quest trigger conditions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市が滅亡、ＪＡＰＡＮに魔軍が攻めようとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The free city has fallen, and the demon army is trying to invade JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城は健在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [天満橋の大軍／通常]発生後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the event [Tenmabashi's large army / normal].

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがやってきた。天満橋を封鎖している魔軍をうまく避けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance has arrived. He skillfully avoided the demon army blocking Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大変だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫もついてきています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kouhime has come along as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六、政宗、政宗の女達との出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting with Isoroku, Masamune, and Masamune’s women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪達の方で何か事件が起こったと聞いたがなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard something happened with the yokai—what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗あたりが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune or someone explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王黒部が復活した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The yokai king Kurobe has been revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 妖怪王はお前だろうが、＞　私は３代目、お町は２代目　現れたのは初代だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are the yokai king, right? > I am the third generation, Ochou is the second, but the one who appeared is the first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から２３００年ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 2300 years ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代妖怪王黒部は藤原石丸と言うＪＡＰＡＮの武者に仕え一時は世界の大半を支配した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first yokai king Kurobe served a JAPAN warrior named Fujiwara Ishimaru and once controlled most of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果としてはその後、魔人ザビエルを中心とする魔軍の攻撃にあい黒部も藤原石丸も死ぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, later they were attacked by the demon army led by the demon Javier, and both Kurobe and Fujiwara Ishimaru died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が魔人と本格的に戦った最初の戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first serious battle where humanity fought demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして今
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ザビエルが滅んだせいか、または、魔軍と人類の大きな戦いが起こったせいかわからぬが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether because demon Javier was destroyed or because a major battle between the demon army and humans occurred, it is unclear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部が蘇った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe has revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部はとても強い。初代妖怪王として尊敬すべき存在。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurobe is very strong — a being worthy of respect as the first yokai king.
